title: How to sum up your life in four sentences, or in one paragraph - Quora

response.answer_text: I was born and brought up in a middle class family in a large town in India.I was a bright student at school, and went on to do engineering degree.I did well in my career, was sent abroad for special assignment, then ran my own business, worked abroad for some years, and finally retired and returned home, and am living happily and peacefully.I have a dedicated wife, 2 loving children (daughter and son, who are doing extremely well in their respective careers), as well as 2 darling grand children (a granddaughter and a grandson), who make our life cheerful and lively.
